name: Demo Job Skipped Logic

on: [workflow_dispatch]

jobs:
  job1:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    outputs:
      ran: ${{ steps.set-output.outputs.ran }}
    steps:
      - name: Set run condition
        id: set-output
        run: |
          if [ "${{ github.actor }}" = "act" ]; then
            echo "ran=true" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          else
            echo "ran=false" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
        # You can change the above logic to simulate a "skip" case

  job2:
    needs: job1
    if: needs.job1.outputs.ran == 'true'
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - run: echo "job1 actually ran, so I'm running too!"
